title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4105.5 - Authority of the presiding judge
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4105.5 - Authority of the presiding judge

State Regulations

The presiding judge at each meeting shall exercise
authority and supervision over the State racing officials and over the
association racing officials assigned to or employed at such meeting. In the
presiding judge's absence, or incapacity, the powers and duties of the
presiding judge shall be exercised by the associate judge designated by the
presiding judge for such purpose. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4105.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
